Типы

Id Name
{{ appType.id }} {{ appType.name }}
import { Component, Inject } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { ApplicationType } from '../modal/applicationtype.mode'; @Component({ selector: 'applicationtype-data', templateUrl: './applicationtype.component.html' }) export class ApplicationTypeComponent { public appTypes: ApplicationType[] = []; http: HttpClient; baseUrl: string = ""; constructor(http: HttpClient, @Inject('BASE_URL') baseUrl: string) { this.http = http; this.baseUrl = baseUrl; this.getType(); } getType() { this.http.get(this.baseUrl + 'Type').subscribe(result => { this.appTypes = result; }); } }
